events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I no longer need it.
The issue was reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on the order.
The case has been assigned to a customer support agent specialized in refunds and returns.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please confirm the reason for the return and if the item has been opened or used.
My order number is 987654321. The item was unopened and I simply changed my mind about the purchase.
We can process your refund once we receive the returned item. I will send you the return shipping label at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and the free shipping label, I really appreciate the help.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should be back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to ensure you received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your return process.
Yes, I received the refund today. Thank you very much for your excellent service and support.
The case has been closed following the successful completion of the refund and positive customer feedback.
We have sent you a short survey to collect your feedback on the refund process and overall customer experience.
